title: Pandas: a gift from China
creator_credit: Thomas Smith and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Shows the two giant pandas presented to the United States in 1972 by China. Records the playful antics of the pandas in their specially designed enclosures at the National Zoological Park in Washington, DC. Also shows the people and jobs that are important to the efficient operation of zoos.
